description: Add tests covering each identified gap: (1) create-then-close by intent ID (proves ID round-trips), (2) create-then-update by intent ID, (3) create pair and link by intent IDs, (4) start intent replay preserves status+assignee, (5) defer intent replay preserves status+date, (6) close with reason round-trips, (7) update description round-trips, (8) multi-word title in update, (9) escaped quotes in title, (10) end-to-end sync replay preserves start/defer state. Tests should fail before fixes and pass after.
title: Add regression tests for intent replay fidelity
